title: Volvo Cars abandons near-term EV-only ambitions
description: Volvo Cars has revised its goal of selling only fully electric cars by 2030. Instead, it will now include plug-in hybrid and mild hybrid models in its lineup. This change is due to slowing EV demand, lack of affordable models, and slow charging infrastructure rollout.
